Name: Cephalexin (Keflex)
Dosage: 250mg per capsule, as a single dose (frequency to be determined by a veterinarian)
Usage: Treatment of bacterial skin infections (e.g., pyoderma, wounds, abscesses) in pets.
Treatment of urinary tract infections in pets.
Treatment of respiratory tract infections in pets.
Treatment of bone and joint infections in pets.
Other susceptible bacterial infections in pets (dogs and cats).

Uncommon Side Effects: Allergic reactions (e.g., rash, hives, facial swelling)
Rarely, changes in blood cell counts or liver/kidney values (typically with long-term use or high doses)
